text: Since version 1.8.2 Ant does not override system properties. For example -Duser.name=newvalue does not override default value as it did before 1.8.2. Other non-system properties can be successfully overridden via -D.
creator: martin.raie@gmail.com
ats37@hotmail.com
text:
Created attachment 27489
Simple test case demonstrating the problem

NB It's not only user.name that's affected, java.home exhibited the same behaviour, so presumably all system properties are the same.
